content: This bounty campaign will be forcefully closed as the team behind them is no longer responding. Will update everyone once the team has responded.Per previous warnings (in registration forms, this thread, and even in my telegram bounty group), this campaign does not have official escrows to their bounty pools as such that bounty rewards aren't guaranteed   [WEBSITE]   [TELEGRAM]   [TWITTER]   [MEDIUM]   [FACEBOOK]   [DISCORD]   [TOKENOMICS]   [WHITEPAPER]   Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. THIS BOUNTY CAMPAIGN DO NOT HAVE OFFICIAL ESCROW TO ITS BOUNTY POOL. BOUNTY REWARDS ARE NOT GUARANTEED BY THE BOUNTY MANAGER. Join (on this bounty campaign)or Invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO) at your own risk.
